title: HyperVIBES Deployment Reimbursement
body:
This proposal is to use the funds from the R Group treasury to cover deployment costs for HyperVIBES

Deployment costs were trivial except for Ethereum and Arbitrum blockchains:

* [Ethereum](https://etherscan.io/tx/0xac27be7091a44702206de8257967cd73ae3d85e286438aeb05a464100ee8c3ee)
* [Arbitrum](https://arbiscan.io/tx/0x234c28ce8d1b8279f6db7c332e6b05496b52fbe59948eaa3bf7506cd7bc324a3)

Total deployment cost was **0.534 ETH**

Reimbursement will be paid to bvalosek.eth in DAI from the R Group multisig based on the market price of ETH at time of payment.

* Vote YES to reimburse @bvalosek
* Vote NO to not reimburse
author: 0x303EeFeDeE1bA8e5d507a55465d946B2fea18583
